--- On=
 Tue, 11/2/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


From: Fr=
ank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] For the "pure E=
VP" enthusiast
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tues=
day, November 2, 2010, 8:30 AM


=C2=A0 


=C2=A0Such as those that think r=
eal EVP can only be received using white noise might want to do some real r=
esearch starting with natural radio and what are call spherics and whistler=
s, or pulses generated by lightening and other "natural" EMF sources. Some,=
=C2=A0 will no doubt claim=C2=A0their system operates at such a high freque=
ncy that it can not get the low frequency EMFs of natural radio--wrong agai=
n. This stuff covers the whole the spectrum from DC to light, and those lit=
tle whispers are=C2=A0mostly just RF noise from natural and man made source=
s, you can even get=C2=A0the noise from big planets, here on Earth, from Ju=
piter and Saturn.=C2=A0 Get a sound=C2=A0 that might seem like singing and =
I am pretty sure it's just what is called a "whistler", probably from terre=
strial lightening. The thunderstorm can be anywhere, this stuff propagates =
just like radio, and there are hundreds of thunderstorms all over the plane=
t at any given moment.=C2=A0 Everytime an electric motor starts, or
 a flor=
escent light, or a car starts, anything that uses electricity, there is goi=
ng to be a magnetic field radiated.=C2=A0 How many electric lights are in t=
he world going on and off!?=C2=A0 How about in a factory, large shop, lab, =
or manufacturing/research facility?Lots and lots of magnetic/electric pulse=
s.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Then, to make it worse, people claim be touched during inve=
stigations might want to investigate static electricity!=C2=A0 Clothes gene=
rate electric fields as we move around, normally it goes unnoticed, but=C2=
=A0moving around=C2=A0in the dark listening and feeling for anything, you m=
ight think you're being touched, or your clothes moved. Could it be just th=
e static electricity causing attraction and/or repulsion of areas of clothi=
ng?=C2=A0 I'm not saying that's what it is. Just be sure, and to get the pu=
re=C2=A0experience, I think all ghost investigations should be done naked t=
o eliminate all static electricity from clothing. :-O 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I know,=
 sounds like debunking, but ya have to stop and think sometimes.=C2=A0 Some=
 of these effects we feel and hear can be caused by natural magnetic and el=
ectric sources. Then, make it worse cuz we can create, via thought forms, j=
ust what we want to experience. One must control one's emotions! 
=C2=A0
=
=C2=A0There are=C2=A0some that have established themselves as experts based=
 on white noise EVP. To maintain position they may claim only white noise E=
VP is acceptable and pure.=C2=A0 What is white noise? A frikkin' raw audio =
in it's simplest form, so why not use higher level sounds and get higher le=
vel voices? When you get voices giving names, answering questions, and even=
 cussing and swearing, I am pretty sure "the box" as it's come to be=C2=A0k=
nown beats the be-geeesies out of white noise BS. Yes, you can get broadcas=
t fragments, and bits that can be mistaken, but with white noise, you can g=
et all kinds of weak noise pulses that probably say nothing, but you are de=
sperately trying to interpret. It's been my experience that the more one fi=
lters and cleans a recording, the more these noises sound intelligible. If =
you have to filter it just to hear if it is saying anything--forget about i=
t!=C2=A0 I think our own minds and psi ability--can--- influence the sounds=
 and create a
 meaning where there was none. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Spirit exists in=
 a higher dimension, as such they have full access to our level and can eas=
ily manipulate sound and everything else. We are limited, they are not. Tha=
t's why I focus on higher level, more energetic phenomenon and ignore stuff=
 like white noise EVP or orbs. Paranormal experience is more dictated by wh=
at one can accept than anything else,=C2=A0 by what one fears as well. 
=C2=
=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Wait=C2=A0for it! Wait for it! Here it comes-- the threats=
 of law suits and how dare you question......
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Am I an expert--=
hell no, ex=3D=3D=3Dhas been, 'spert=3D=3Ddrip under pressure.=C2=A0I don't=
 want to be a "paranormal expert" 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

<DIV> Such as those that think real EVP can only=

erated by lightening and other "natural" EMF sources. Some,  will no d=
oubt claim their system operates at such a high frequency that it can =
not get the low frequency EMFs of natural radio--wrong again. This stuff co=
vers the whole the spectrum from DC to light, and those little whispers are=
 mostly just RF noise from natural and man made sources, you can even =
get the noise from big planets, here on Earth, from Jupiter and Saturn=
.  Get a sound  that might seem like singing and I am pretty sure=
 it's just what is called a "whistler", probably from terrestrial lightenin=
g. The thunderstorm can be anywhere, this stuff propagates just like radio,=
 and there are hundreds of thunderstorms all over the planet at any given m=
oment. 
 Everytime an electric motor starts, or a florescent light, or=
 a car starts, anything that uses electricity, there is going to be a magne=
tic field radiated.  How many electric lights are in the world going o=
n and off!?  How about in a factory, large shop, lab, or manufacturing=
/research facility?Lots and lots of magnetic/electric pulses.</DIV>

bsp;</DIV>

g investigations might want to investigate static electricity!  Clothe=

you might think you're being touched, or your clothes moved. Could it be ju=
st the static electricity causing attraction and/or repulsion of areas of c=
lothing?  I'm not saying that's what <U>it is</U>. Just be sure, and t=
o get the pure experience, I think all ghost investigations should be =
done naked to eliminate all static electricity from clothing. :-O </DIV>
<D=
